metadata.title: 5300-3 -- PHP vulnerabilities
metadata.description: USN-5300-1 fixed vulnerabilities in PHP. This update provides the corresponding updates for Ubuntu 21.10.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled certain scripts.  An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  (CVE-2015-9253, CVE-2017-8923, CVE-2017-9118, CVE-2017-9120)    It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled certain inputs.  An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service,  or possibly obtain sensitive information. (CVE-2017-9119)    It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled certain scripts with XML  parsing functions.  An attacker could possibly use this issue to obtain sensitive information.  (CVE-2021-21707)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5300-3` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  php8.0-fpm - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-enchant - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-xml - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-dba - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-xsl - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-mbstring - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-opcache - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-cli - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-snmp - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-phpdbg - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-tidy - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-zip - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-gmp - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-interbase - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 libapache2-mod-php8.0 - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-bcmath - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-dev - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-ldap - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-soap - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-curl - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-intl - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-pspell - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-odbc - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-sybase - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0 - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-gd - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-bz2 - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-mysql - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-readline - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-sqlite3 - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 libphp8.0-embed - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-pgsql - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-common - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-cgi - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 php8.0-imap - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.3 No subscription required
